Name: Phutakun
Review Text: A small and cozy place in the heart of Amsterdam. Large menu with good choice. Pad Thai was amazing. Fresh vegetables and fresh meat. The soup was average in my opinion. Lacked taste and it was a tiny portion for 6,5 euros. I recommend this place for everyone who loves Thai cuisine.

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Amazing service by Erixx and great food.  As a regular of this Thai restaurant, I would say this is one of the best restaurants in Amsterdam hands down!

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Very good and fresh food. Vegan and with meat was both tasty. The service was also kind and fast.

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: I was in Amsterdam for the weekend and for some unplanned reason ended up eating my dinners at thai restaurants. This one is the best in the city. The location is perfect if you want a relatively lesser tourist crowd. It is also slightly bigger and more organized. Service was lovely and the food was superb!

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Incredible food and service. Very authentic, fresh and delicious Thai. Loved it!

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: The food is very fresh and nice. Its a good thai place to please your taste buds. The chef was very nice and so was the staff. We ordered spring roll, fish soup and a prawn fry, and the service was prompt and really good quantity too.

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Honestly, I have been at all Thai restaurants all over Amsterdam. And this is definitly the best one without a doubt.. ‚Ä¶

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Simply excellent Thai food, cozy atmosphere, highly recommended! Try the Som Tam!

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Great Thai in the heart of the city. Really decent price for an Amsterdam restaurant, professional service and very delicious curries and noodles. Not too spicy but sambal is available. Will definitely be back!

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Delicious authentic Thai food. The staff and owner are super welcoming and friendly. Great atmosphere and I enjoyed a lot the time yum soup and panaeng chicken.

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Food was really good, they have vegan options and everything can be made gluten free! I really recommend it if you like thai food.

Name: Phutakun
Review Text:
Amazing food and service.

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: I had a wonderful dinner at Thai Phutakun. It was delicious, the service was very courteous. The waitress accidentally spill the tonic left in my glass; she apologized, cleanzd the table quicly and offered two new drinks, for my colleague and I. I took their card and will return when I visit Amsterdam again.

Name: Phutakun

Review Text: Came across this quaint Thai place on a side street with wife.  Decided to give it a try for dinner based on its high Trip Advisor ranking.  It did not disappoint. Food and service were the culinary highlight of our long weekend in ‚Ä¶

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: One or maybe the best massaman curry chicken that I have ever tried. It is not in the menu as they offer it with beef but they had no problem to change it. Totally recommended. The portions are a bit small but you can order more rice if needed. Another advantage is that it is open until late and there is no need to book a table

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Seated on the worst place with no space and unstable table. Gave order 20 minutes later. Food lacks spiciness and depth we are familiar with Thai food. Overall it was a negative experience and will not visit this restaurant again. There are much better  alternatives which respects the Thai cuisine and culture.

Name: Phutakun
Review Text:
The food was exceptional, best Thai food I have eaten in years. Amazing soups and seafood dishes. The service was very good and the staff is realy friendly
I also think the prices were very reasonable
Diffidently dining there again

Review Text: Wow ! What a great find ! Love the interior and the food üëåüèª long selection of vegetarian dishes . I ordered the cashew dish and it's one of the best cashew dishes that I have ever had ( and I eat it often ) . If I could give this place 6 ‚Ä¶

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Great place at a good central location but away from the busiest streets. The food was delicious and the staff friendly and professional. Only "bad" thing was that they were out of soup in the restroom. Recommend this to everyone who like thai food!

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Excellent food, friendly service and very reasonable prices. I went there on a Saturday evening since my first choice was fully booked, but I'm actually glad i discovered this place. Would definitely recommend

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: I totally recommend this restaurant. The staff was really kind, the food was great and not expensive. I've been there during an holiday and if I went to Amsterdam I would go to Thai Phutakun again.

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Really good food, shrimps with vegetables. The service was fast.

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Great food, very friendly people.  I stopped by and they had not opened yet but the owner opened up sooner so I could come in and eat.  The food is as good as the friendliness of the people working there!

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: Waitress was super nice and very helpful with choosing from the extensive menu. Place was also relatively quiet at 6pm, considering it's right off the main tourist route from the Dam Square to Vondelpark.

Name: Phutakun
Review Text: One of the best spots in the city, and the best pad thai, fantastic service and great prices

Name: Phutakun

Review Text: I hate to come to this restaurant because so many people waiting for the table especially at dinner time. But  I went to this place twice during my 5 days visit Amsterdam. They served a good Thai food.

Review Text: Lovely place! Friendly and kind service, and the food was absolutely incredible. A bit on the pricey side, but you cannot be disappointed by the quality of this experience.
